Length: 10 1/2" (cuffed)

name: Floral Cropped Top
description:
This is a OOAK creation~

Taken from a vintage jacket, this piece was restyled to be a cute, summery mini vest or sleeveless crop-top. The collar & around the sleeves were hand studded. Under the arms it is held together with safety pins. 3 buttons hold the front closed.

The measurements are as follows;

Bust: 40" around
Shoulders: 17" wide
Length: 15"

This piece will ship within 1 - 3 days of purchase.
It will ship priority mail (for domestic orders) and should reach you within 2 - 3 business days

**Washing instructions will come written down with the garment***

Take good care of your handmade & altered garments so they will last with you longer <3

For Gift Wrap options or Further Questions, please send me a message!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Model Measurements;

Bust = 36"
Shoulders = 18"
Waist = 30"

name: Bad Bitch Moto Vest
description:
~ This vest is the only one of it's kind ~

Upcycled from a faux leather jacket I no longer wore, I ripped it apart and studded new life into it.

This is a cropped moto-style vest with working pocket zippers & front zipper
Studs featuring upcycled chains hang from the wide collar.
"Bad Bitch" in gold glitter iron on letters rests on the back of the garment.

Measurements;:

Length = 17 "
Waist when zipped = 16"
Shoulder width = 14.5"

This piece will ship within 1 - 3 days of purchase.
It will ship priority mail (for domestic orders) and should reach you within 2 - 3 business days

**Washing instructions will come written down with the garment***

Take good care of your handmade & altered garments so they will last with you longer <3

For Gift Wrap options or Further Questions, please send me a message!
